SEARCH
Package library.service

Class LibraryService

java.lang.Object
library.service.LibraryService
public class LibraryService extends Object
Main service class for the library. Handles users, media, loans, fines, and basic reporting.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a new LibraryService with all required dependencies.

  • Constructor Details

    • LibraryService

      public LibraryService(UserRepository userRepo, MediaRepository mediaRepo, LoanRepository loanRepo, ReminderService reminderService, TimeProvider timeProvider, FineStrategy bookFine, FineStrategy cdFine, AuthService authService)
      Creates a new LibraryService with all required dependencies.
      Parameters:
      userRepo - repository for users
      mediaRepo - repository for media (books, CDs)
      loanRepo - repository for loans
      reminderService - reminder service used for overdue notifications
      timeProvider - provider for current date
      bookFine - fine strategy used for books
      cdFine - fine strategy used for CDs
      authService - auth service for admin checks

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public User registerUser(String name, String email)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      name - user name
      email - user email
      Returns:
      the created User instance

    • addBook

      public void addBook(String title, String author, String isbn)
      Adds a new book to the media repository.
      Parameters:
      title - book title
      author - author name
      isbn - book ISBN

    • addCD

      public void addCD(String title, String artist)
      Adds a new CD to the media repository.
      Parameters:
      title - CD title
      artist - CD artist or band

    • search

      public List<Media> search(String q)
      Generic search by query. Delegates to MediaRepository.search.
      Parameters:
      q - search text (matched against title, author, artist, ISBN, or id)
      Returns:
      list of matching media

    • searchByTitle

      public List<Media> searchByTitle(String title)
      Searches media items by title.
      Parameters:
      title - partial or full title
      Returns:
      list of media with matching titles

    • searchByAuthor

      public List<Media> searchByAuthor(String author)
      Searches media items by author (for books) or artist (for CDs).
      Parameters:
      author - name or partial name of author/artist
      Returns:
      list of matching media

    • searchByIsbn

      public List<Media> searchByIsbn(String isbn)
      Searches media items by ISBN (books only, exact match).
      Parameters:
      isbn - ISBN string
      Returns:
      list of books with that ISBN, or empty list

    • borrow

      public void borrow(String userId, String mediaId)
      Borrows a media item for a user.
      • Checks for outstanding fines
      • Checks for overdue loans
      • Ensures media is available
      • Creates a loan and sets due date based on media type
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user
      mediaId - id of the media item
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if user or media is not found
      BusinessRuleException - if rules are violated (fine, overdue, not available)

    • returnMedia

      public void returnMedia(String loanId)
      Returns a borrowed media item and applies fines if overdue.
      • Marks the loan as returned
      • Makes the media item available again
      • Calculates overdue fine using the proper strategy
      Parameters:
      loanId - id of the loan
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if loan is not found
      BusinessRuleException - if the loan was already returned

    • payFine

      public void payFine(String userId, int amount)
      Applies a payment to a user's outstanding fine.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user
      amount - amount to pay
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if user is not found

    • unregisterUser

      public void unregisterUser(String adminUser, String userId)
      Unregisters a user from the system.
      • Requires admin to be logged in
      • User must not have active (unreturned) loans
      • User must not have unpaid fines
      Parameters:
      adminUser - not used, just kept for possible future expansion
      userId - id of the user to remove
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if user is not found
      BusinessRuleException - if user has active loans or unpaid fines

    • getReminderService

      public ReminderService getReminderService()
      Returns:
      the ReminderService associated with the library

    • findLoansByUser

      public List<Loan> findLoansByUser(String userId)
      Finds all loans that belong to a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user
      Returns:
      list of loans

    • getBorrowedMediaReport

      public List<String> getBorrowedMediaReport()
      Builds a simple text-based report of all active (not returned) loans. Each line contains loan id, media, user, due date, status, and fine estimate. The last line shows the total fine across all active overdue loans.
      Returns:
      list of report lines
